verbs.description: The dustup over a White House aide 's crass remark about Sen. John McCain 's health [V: has] once again inflamed the White House 's frustration with staffers who reveal the inner workings of the West Wing to reporters outside the building . Despite active efforts to flush out administration leakers -- including machines used to detect unauthorized cell phones in the West Wing -- President Donald Trump and his senior aides have n't yet been able to stem the flow of damaging information .
